dublin_core.dcvalue: Interactive Session Mobile Content Distribution for Health Worker Training This hands on workshop led by mPowering Frontline Health Workers will help participants deliver quality assured health training content via mobile devices This process known as Open Deliver allows governments and other stakeholders to collaborate on identifying adapting delivering and evaluating training content This session will focus on using the process for health worker training but content can be distributed to community members or other audiences In this session participants will simulate the five steps in the Open Deliver process By the end of the workshop participants will be well versed in the advantages of mobile training and understand the steps involved in carrying out a comprehensive process of mobile content distribution Presented by Carolyn Moore Acting Director mPowering Frontline Health WorkersMichael Bailey Senior Country Advisor mPowering Frontline Health Workers
Digital Content for Frontline Health Worker Training
